title: NHAI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 15 General Manager Posts
description: The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the 15 vacancies for General Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NHAI Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the webs...
